page.title: 12TRANSPORT TRADEGIES
page.content: {Rural transport is a major problem. The bus services are totaly inadequate for the village youth, getting them neither to work nor to play - no buses after 5.30 pm. The only possible transport to work in neigbouring towns or villages for a 16 year old school leaver is the{motor bike}and the {accident toll is horrendous. Deaths (3 youths killed within 3 months) amputations, brain damage, all have harrowed the village recently. Parents must choose between banning the motor bike and condemning their children to{unemployment:}when they relent, each cold wet winter evening brings worry and waiting. Even at 17 and car-drivers at last, youth being reckless, the accident level is still high. Hardly a week goes by without some incident or injury, whose consequences linger on.
